steps.title: Choose the AWS connection you want to use
steps.description:
OpenOps can pull data from AWS using the connection you select here. We provide a CloudFormation stack that installs the required permissions for you.

CloudFormation stack: [Create a read-only role](https://example.com/cloudformation-readonly)

Documentation: [How to set up AWS read-only permissions](https://example.com/docs/aws-readonly)
